response.original_title: BanG Dream! Live: THE CREATION ~We are RAISE A SUILEN~
response.overview: THE CREATION ~We are RAISE A SUILEN~ is RAISE A SUILEN's sixth live concert. It was announced on Day 1 of Rausch und/and Craziness. It was held on December 29, 2019 at LINE CUBE SHIBUYA. The concert was live-broadcasted in select movie theaters in Japan, Hong Kong, Taiwan and South Korea.  Recorded footage of the live was included in the limited Blu-ray edition of RAISE A SUILEN's 7th single, EXIST, which was released on April 21, 2021.
response.title: BanG Dream! Live: THE CREATION ~We are RAISE A SUILEN~
